version_description:
1. Fix SSH connection & idle timeout bug.
2. Fix crash if Destination host/port is not specified.
3. Fix Private key textarea bug.
4. Provide a link to a Proxy Auto-Configuration (PAC) file for Dynamic port forwarding.
5. Added connection

Features & Fixes:

1. Connection data transfer statistics.
2. Tunnel & Accept debug logs.
3. Passcode & TouchID protection.
4. Connection Export & Import.
5. Added ability to specify an idle disconnect timeout.
6. Abil

- Added strict host checking (known hosts management)
- Added an option to bind to a specific IP address
- Now you are able to customize a PAC file
- Added ability to duplicate an existing connection
- In-app purchase was removed from the app<

Reduce energy consumption.
Added ability to reorder SSH connections.
Fixed bug with a missed dot between IP address and port on an active connection screen.
The core library is updated to the latest version.

Reduce energy consumption.
Added ability to reorder SSH connections.
Fixed bug with a missed dot between IP address and port on an active connection screen.
The core library is updated to the latest version.
Fix performance issue.

WARNING: The app can't work in the background due to the App Store limitations.

Added support of "keyboard-interaction" auth method.
Added support of ED25519 and ECDSA private keys.
NFC OTP support (Yubikey).
Support of Putty private keys

Added in-app browser (click globe icon on active connection screen)
The app will show WiFi IP address on active connection screen if Bind Address is "0.0.0.0"

Added in-app browser (click globe icon on active connection screen)
The app will show WiFi IP address on active connection screen if Bind Address is "0.0.0.0"
